scripts.docs: npm run docs:all && documentation build --config .documentation.yml --markdown-toc true --shallow true -f md -o docs/documentation.md
scripts.docs:all: npm-run-all -p docs:sotez docs:key docs:crypto docs:contract docs:forge docs:ledger docs:utility
scripts.docs:crypto: documentation build lib/cryptoUtils.js --sort-order 'alpha' --markdown-toc false --shallow true -f md -o docs/crypto.md
scripts.docs:contract: documentation build lib/contract.js --sort-order 'alpha' --markdown-toc false --shallow true -f md -o docs/contract.md
scripts.docs:forge: documentation build lib/forge.js --sort-order 'alpha' --markdown-toc false --shallow true -f md -o docs/forge.md
scripts.docs:key: documentation build lib/key.js --sort-order 'alpha' --markdown-toc false --shallow true -f md -o docs/key.md
scripts.docs:ledger: documentation build lib/ledger.js --sort-order 'alpha' --markdown-toc false --shallow true -f md -o docs/ledger.md
scripts.docs:sotez: documentation build lib/sotez.js --sort-order 'alpha' --markdown-toc false --shallow true -f md -o docs/sotez.md
scripts.docs:utility: documentation build lib/utility.js --sort-order 'alpha' --markdown-toc false --shallow true -f md -o docs/utility.md
